pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Bio-Tech Hydrate Leave in Treatment 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Powered by the science of nature, BIO-TECH HYDRATE ALL-IN-ONE LEAVE-IN TREATMENT formulated with Olive Squalane & Hemp Seed Oil provides intense hydration for dry & dehydrated hair for smoothness and strength. 0% Artificial Colourants & Silicones

The BIO-TECH HYDRATE range with OLIVE SQUALANE & HEMP SEED OIL treats the needs of dry and dehydrated hair, providing nourished and repaired hair full of moisture.

ALL-IN-ONE Benefits:
1. Intense Moisture
2. Deep Nourishment
3. Easy Detangling
4. Hair Repair
5. Anti-Breakage
6. Split Ends Prevention
7. Softness & Shine
8. Strengthening
9. Anti-Frizz Effect
10. Damage Protection

Made In Australia

100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

Suitable For: Dry, Dehydrated Hair

Size: 150mL

Hair Type: Dry, Dehydrated Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Intensively Hydrates, Moisturises & Smoothes Hair
• WITH:
+ OLIVE SQUALANE
+ HEMP SEED OIL
+ LIQUID KERATIN
+ APRICOT KERNEL OIL
• NO:
- ARTIFICIAL COLOURANTS
- SILICONES
- MINERAL OILS
- EDTA
- TRIETHANOLAMINE
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Free from Artificial Colourants, Silicones, Mineral Oils, EDTA, Triethanolamine

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau) · Cetearyl Alcohol · Quaternium-87 · Isopropyl Myristate · Gylcerin · Phenoxyethanol · Propylene Glycol · Methylparaben · Glyceryl Stearate · Hydroxyethylcellulose · Parfum (Fragrance) · Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate · Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil · Panthenol · Squalane · Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil · Cyclamen Aldehyde

Directions

Distribute a small amount into the palms and apply to the mid-lengths and ends of the hair. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap are Kerbside Recyclable. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
